p: Sunflower ( Helianthus annuus L.) is a species of Compositae, which has varieties of nutritional functions and medicinal benefits [ 1]. Sunflower is commercially grown all over the world, especially has the higher production in China, Argentina, Russia and France. At present, the research on sunflower mainly focused on seeds [ 1, 2, 3, 4]. However, sunflower receptacles have not been researched as popularly as seeds.
